articles.title: The Stanley Parable: Ultra Deluxe has a cursed awareness of its own weird, culty relevance - Rock Paper Shotgun

articles.content: The Stanley Parable is a game about a man who leaves his desk one day to discover that all of his most difficult to animate colleagues have vanished. First released in 2011 as a Half-Life 2 mod, it i… [+6010 chars]
